data.name: Warface - Winter Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
This package contains the following items:

  • Winter weapons for all classes: AUG A3 9mm XS, MC 255 12, XM8 Sharpshooter, CALICO M955A;
  • 45-day VIP bonus (100% XP Reward Boost, 50% Arsenal Unlock Boost, 75% Money Reward Boost);
  • All Arctic Squad body skins;
  • 2000 Kredits.

If you purchase this pack, you get 190% more item value than you would buying the items separately.

The “Winter” option is designed for those who want to crush their enemies and do it in style: a golden mean between the “Fast Start” and “Deluxe” packages. It provides you with a 45-day VIP bonus, 2000 Kredits and comes in two variants. This one has Arctic Squad body skins and Winter weapons.

MORE ABOUT THE WEAPONS:


Assault rifle – CALICO M955A. CALICO M955A is an assault rifle noted for its high fire rate and the largest cartridge of all assault rifles available, as well as a large number of modifications. The Winter model has improved specifications. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions, scopes and rail modifications available.

Shotgun – MC 255 12. MC 255 12 is a reliable shotgun mostly loved for its high damage and good hip accuracy. Yet the Winter model improves its specifications strongly enough to make MC 255 12 a weapon of choice for medics in Warface. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions and scopes modifications available.

SMG – AUG A3 9mm XS. A3 9mm XS is a well-balanced SMG due to its combination of perfect hip/aimed accuracy and high rate of fire. The Winter model has increased damage and range. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions, scopes and rail modifications available.

Sniper rifle – XM8 Sharpshooter. XM8 Sharpshooter is suited for all snipers willing to eliminate their enemy swiftly and efficiently: it has the highest rate of fire of all sniper rifles in the game. The Winter model has improved damage and reduced recoil. Outfit the weapon to suit your playstyle with a variety of barrel extensions, scopes and rail modifications available.

It provides you with a 45-day VIP bonus, 2000 Kredits and comes in two variants. This one has Arctic Squad body skins and Winter weapons.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
